title: Shows to Watch for Oct. 16-22, 2015
text: Shows to Watch for Oct. 16-22, 2015 Shows to Watch for Oct. 16-22, 2015 Photo provided by Devious Planet Media -- On a 25th anniversary tour, pop-rock band Rusted Root will perform Friday at the Varsity Theatre. Photo provided by Press Here Publicity -- Better Than Ezra, a nationally known pop-rock band formed in when its members were LSU students, returns to Baton Rouge to perform Friday at L'Auberge Casino & Hotel. Photo provided by Kymm Britton -- Nashville-based Americana singer-songwriter Todd Snider performs Wednesday at the Manship Theatre. Elizabeth Cook opens the show at 8 p.m. Advocate staff photo by HILARY SCHEINUK -- Baton Rouge singer-pianist Henry Gray will play the blues at 7 p.m. Friday at the Magnolia Caf√© in St. Francisville. Photo provided -- Big-selling country duo Florida Georgia Line appears Friday at the Smoothie King Center in New Orleans. Thomas Rhett and Frankie Ballard are also on the bill. Advocate story
